intro: Hiraea polybotrya, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. Its leaves are thick, fleshy, and arranged in a rosette pattern, which helps it retain moisture. Hiraea polybotrya is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
